sentence.Network_en: Before the race, he is fine. But afterwards he is worn out.
sentence.Network_cn: 赛前他状态很好，赛后就筋疲力尽了。

sentence.Network_en: She wondered where they were going to rendezvous afterwards.
sentence.Network_cn: 她想知道之后他们要去哪里约会。

sentence.Network_en: Shortly afterwards, cuts in defence spending forced the aerospace industry to retrench.
sentence.Network_cn: 不久之后，国防开支的削减迫使航空航天业紧缩开支。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 牛津初中英语词汇表_百度文库 ... A-1-8 afternoon 下午，午后 7 A-2-23 afterwards 后来，以后 7 A-6-98 again 又，再次 7.
大英语B级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... afternoon n. 午后,下午 afterwards adv. 然后,后来地 again adv. 又,再次.
英文字典_百度文库 ... afternoon 下午 afterwards 之后 again 再一次.
闭着眼睛飘单词(四级)_百度文库 ... advisable 可取的,适当的 afterwards 以后,过后,后来 alarm 惊恐,忧虑.

list.abs: 国际贸易常用英语词汇.doc_百度文库 ... 每隔一行 every other line 不久以后 shortly afterwards 通向 lead to.
新概念第二册短语词组汇总 - 豆丁网 ... throw to 扔向…… shortly afterwards 没过多久 9. set,up 创立，建立.
有哲理的英语诗_百度知道 ... The Arrow And The Song 箭与歌 Long,long afterward,in an oak 很久，很久以后，在一棵橡树上，.
2012-11-02 内核更新 ... ... gzip compress： 文件压缩程序 ；压缩备份 reboot afterwards ： 重启之后 Chose backup 选择备份.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  æftewearde, from æftan 'aft' + -wards,influenced by after

entry.tran: （某个事件或已提及的时间）之后
entry.def: If you do something or if something happens afterwards, you do it or it happens after a particular event or time that has already been mentioned.

example.ex: Shortly afterwards, police arrested four suspects...
example.tran: 之后不久，警方逮捕了4名嫌犯。

example.ex: James was taken to hospital but died soon afterwards...
example.tran: 詹姆斯被送往医院，但随后不久就死了。

means.word_mean: 1. happening at a time subsequent to a reference time;

sentences.sentence: "he's going to the store but he'll be back here later"

auth_sentence.content: In the bar afterwards, I connected with Homer.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the bar afterwards, I connected with Homer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the bar afterwards, I connected with Homer.

auth_sentence.content: Shortly afterwards, Lloyd was signed to Syco Music.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shortly afterwards, Lloyd was signed to Syco Music.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shortly afterwards, Lloyd was signed to Syco Music.

Sentence.sentence: They fear they will regret it afterwards.

jushi.english: Let's go to the theatre first and eat afterwards.
jushi.chinese: 咱们先去看戏，然后吃饭。

jushi.english: They separated, and soon afterwards Jane left the country.
jushi.chinese: 他们分开后不久简离开了这个国家。
